analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x1dfb7ea4e6302708bd4a83b9e1d368c3e681a1d8.sol:
	Contract BUXCOIN has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x1dfb7ea4e6302708bd4a83b9e1d368c3e681a1d8.sol#219)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x1dfb7ea4e6302708bd4a83b9e1d368c3e681a1d8.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
